headline: Consumer-Centric and Tech-Driven: The CPG Trends of 2026
summary: Growth in consumer packaged goods will come not only from products, but also from how brands meet consumers where they spend time, earn trust, and use technology to make interactions effortless and relevant.

raw.headline: Consumer-Centric and Tech-Driven: The CPG Trends of 2026
raw.summary: Growth in consumer packaged goods will come not only from products, but also from how brands meet consumers where they spend time, earn trust, and use technology to make interactions effortless and relevant.

headline: Kellanova (K): Evaluating Whether Shares Are Undervalued After Recent Steady Gains
summary: Kellanova (K) shares haven’t moved much over the past week; however, the past 3 months show steady gains for investors. The company’s recent performance offers a solid base for those considering its stock. See our latest analysis for Kellanova. After a year of steady progress, Kellanova shows momentum is building with a 5.6% total shareholder return over the past year and a robust 39.6% total return across three years. This upward trend hints at renewed optimism about the company’s growth and...

headline: 3 Reasons K is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Since May 2025, Kellanova has been in a holding pattern, posting a small return of 1.5% while floating around $83.31. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 16.4% gain during that period.
